website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic gift for a child who would appreciate a Superman figure that looks just like his cartoon counterpart and can effortlessly strike heroic poses.
pros: Superman looks like he just stepped out of the cartoon
cons: There are more detailed Superman figures available

customer_reviews.title: So glad to find this
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old daughter is all about super heroes right now and this is a great find for her. She has Wonder Woman and Super Girl in the 12" dolls, but told me she wanted the guys too. Superman now lives with Disney Princesses and Wonder Woman in a Barbie house. And everyone seems to be getting along nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Beckster

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Tough toy.
customer_reviews.text: He's Superman! AWESOME! 😉 Superman is kicking butt & even has my grandson beat on how tough he is w/action heroes & villains. Ty Amazon & Mattel 💟
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Happy

customer_reviews.title: Happy son
customer_reviews.text: Durable! My son crashes all of his action figures together and none have broken or are missing any paint or anything. Very affordable for 12 in action figures in comparison to many places.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Scott-Budd

customer_reviews.title: This one bends and rotates at the joints and is very sturdy and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves playing with Superman. This one bends and rotates at the joints and is very sturdy and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: lisido01

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to shenanigans of a 3 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves these figures. We have so many. Barbies for boys is ehat I call them. He carries this one around everywhere and has been super-rough with him. Holds up well to 3 year old knocking him about.
customer_reviews.author: McCleskey1813

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 year old he loves superheroes and this is a cool design and very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Zach F.

customer_reviews.title: but looks genuine enough to keep the little one happy.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong if your little one is obsessed with superheroes! Nothing bends or comes off, but looks genuine enough to keep the little one happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cuthbert

product_meta.title: Mattel DC Justice League Action Superman Figure, 12"
product_meta.description: This exciting new 12" Superman figure captures the unique look and sleek style of the Justice League Action team. Inspired by the animated entertainment, it features an enhanced red and blue power suit, refreshed facial design and a red cloth cape. There is also added articulation at the knees for 11 total points. With a variety of DC figures in the full assortment, including Batman, Wonder Woman, Kyrpton Tech Superman, Blue Beetle, Green Arrow, Cyborg and more, fans can recreate all of their favorite good versus evil battles. Each sold separately, subject to availability.
feature_bullets: New 12" Superman Action figure with enhanced details, power suit and cloth cape
Added articulation at the knee, for a total of 11 points
Assortment features a wide variety of figures: Batman, The Flash, Wonder Woman, The Joker, Cyborg and more. Each figure sold separately, subject to availability
​Recreate your favorite Super Hero combat and defeat DC's most powerful Super-Villains

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars436 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
